import Mathlib

variable {E F : Type*} [SeminormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace â„ E] [FiniteDimensional â„ E]
  [SeminormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace â„ F]

/-- For finite-dimensional normed spaces over â„, the operator norm of a continuous linear map
    equals the maximum (supremum) of the norms on the unit sphere and the (closed / open)
    unit ball. -/
theorem operator_norm_eq_sup_unit_sets (A : E â†’L[â„] F) :
  (â€–Aâ€– = â¨† (x : E) (h : â€–xâ€– = 1), â€–A xâ€–) âˆ§
  (â€–Aâ€– = â¨† (x : E) (h : â€–xâ€– â‰¤ 1), â€–A xâ€–) âˆ§
  (â€–Aâ€– = â¨† (x : E) (h : â€–xâ€– < 1), â€–A xâ€–) := by sorry
